Screenshot.AltText: Running tests from command line using Echo.
Screenshot.Description: Gallio.Echo.exe is a command line test runner. It has a progress monitor which gives you feedback about the status of a test run. Additionally, it allows you to specify the destination and format (say xml, mht, etc.) of your results. Use plugins to generate customized reports and charts.

Gallio's test runner is integrated in to visual studio. When you open any test inside visual studio it presents you a green and yellow circle adjacent to test. Left-Click to open up a pane which presents you a list of actions. Apart from running/debugging a test, it allows you to create sessions of tests from different fixtures. These sessions can be stored and you can run them.

When you run a test inside visual studio, the results are displayed in a new window pane. This window has a button to display condensed/full test report. When selected it displays the test results in a new tab right inside visual studio. Note that the exceptions box has clickable links which navigate directly to the displayed location right inside visual studio!!!
